name: Ebi Fry
recipeInstructions: 1. Shell the prawns, leaving the tail. Pierce the back of the prawn with a skewer, and remove the salt vein. Remove the sharp pointed scales from the tail and trim.
2. Add a little salt to the prawns, dust with potato starch, add water and mix.
4. Dry the prawns on a paper towel.
5. Score the stomach of the prawns diagonally and, from the back, break the resistance of the body with your fingers to stop them curling when cooked.
7. Beat the egg in a bowl and add a little water.
8. Roll the prawns in the flour, dip in the egg and coat with breadcrumbs.
